post.text: THANK YOU West Palm Beach, Florida! We will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Jordan
comment.text: American's should be ashamed to even think about voting this excuse of a human bean as their leader, let alone support his campaign by donating to his campaign. I am an Aussie and have no interest in your political parties though it is disturbing how America's political wars are making news headlines over here.

replies.author: Tiler
replies.text: Then keep your comments to yourself.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: hahaha you are obviously a Trumper. Probably a dumb American too

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: public forums are for people to express their opinions
